# Slider legend



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Slider legend displays values on the slider.

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute          | Description                                                  | Type                  | Default        |
| --------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------- | -------------- |
| `labelPrefix`   | `label-prefix`     | Defines the prefix applied to the label.                     | `string \| undefined` | `undefined`    |
| `labelStep`     | `label-step`       | Defines specific step to interval use for the label display. | `number \| undefined` | `undefined`    |
| `labelSuffix`   | `label-suffix`     | Defines the suffix applied to the label.                     | `string \| undefined` | `undefined`    |
| `showMinAndMax` | `show-min-and-max` | Defines whether the min and max values are displayed.        | `boolean`             | `true`         |
| `theme`         | `theme`            | Defines the theme of the component.                          | `"Dark" \| "Light"`   | `ThemeDefault` |


## Slots

| Slot                       | Description                                                                              |
| -------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"{{value}}-tick-content"` | Dynamic slot name that allows passing custom rendered content to each tag input element. |


----------------------------------------------
